PPI::Structure::For(3) User Contributed Perl Documentation PPI::Structure::For(3)

NAME

PPI::Structure::For - Circular braces for a for expression

SYNOPSIS

  for ( var $i = 0; $i < $max; $i++ ) {
      ...
  }

INHERITANCE

  PPI::Structure::For
  isa PPI::Structure
      isa PPI::Node
          isa PPI::Element

DESCRIPTION

"PPI::Structure::For" is the class used for circular braces that contain the three part "for" expression.

METHODS

"PPI::Structure::For" has no methods beyond those provided by the standard PPI::Structure, PPI::Node and PPI::Element methods.

Got any ideas for methods? Submit a report to rt.cpan.org!

SUPPORT

See the support section in the main module.
